data.title: Octavia Spencer Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Octavia Spencer on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Octavia Spencer including Zootopia, Onward, and more.
data.text:
The Euclid Alternative

Leonard and his friends stage an intervention to make Sheldon confront his longstanding fear of driving.

Game Over

Jack (Alec Baldwin) recruits rival Devin Banks (guest star Will Arnett) as his ally in an elaborate plan to discredit teenage nemesis and future KableTown CEO, Kaylie Hooper (guest star Chloe Grace Moretz). Liz (Tina Fey) explores her options to become a mother while Tracy (Tracy Morgan) tries to direct Octavia Spencer (guest star Octavia Spencer) in his new movie. Megan Mullally also guest stars.

High School Play

Malcolmâs friendships suffer when he becomes the suddenly popular star of a high school play; Hal and Dewey build their very own Utopia from plastic blocks.
